abstract: BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company, must raise its $127 billion bid for the Rio Tinto Group to at least match the price Aluminum Corporation of China paid for its stake, Bloomberg News reported citing investors and analysts.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company, must raise its $127 billion bid for the Rio Tinto Group to at least match the price Aluminum Corporation of China paid for its stake, Bloomberg News reported citing investors and analysts.

headline.main: BHP May Need to Match Chinalco Bid for Rio
